entry.title: THM - Tech_Supp0rt:1
entry.summary: Tech_Supp0rt: 1 About The Room Hack into the scammer’s under-development website to foil their plans. entry.title: THM - Blog
entry.summary: Blog About The Room Billy Joel made a Wordpress blog! Url: https://tryhackme.com/room/blog Creator: Nameless0ne Difficulty: Medium First Thing First We should add (IP) blog.thm to our /etc/hosts file, so that it runs smoothly via AWS ┌──(uber㉿uber)-[~/Desktop/THM/BillyBlog] └─$ cat /etc/hosts | grep blog 10.10.43.206 blog.thm Reconnaissance Nmap nmap -v -sC -sV 10.10.43.206 Start...
